definitions.definition: A non-zero quantity whose magnitude is smaller than any positive number (by definition it is not a real number).
Incalculably, exceedingly, or immeasurably minute; vanishingly small.
definitions.example: Do you ever get the feeling that you are but an infinitesimal speck, swallowed by the vastness of the universe and beyond?

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to values that approach zero as a limit.
